General.Name: PT Rohartindo Nusantara Luas T
General.Description: PT Rohartindo Nusantara Luas Tbk trades in tools, household appliances, and suitcases in Indonesia. Its tool products include cordless drillsets, cordless products, rings, socks, and toolkits. The company also offers its products online. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Rohartindo Nusantara Luas Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Rohartindo Maju Perkasa.
